segments.text: I notice the sink overflowing with water cascading down.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman doesn't react at all; her foot's soaked.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's so intent on that plate, towel bunched up.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Dishes are stacked neatly beside her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The window shows a lovely garden path with bushes.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But inside, the boy's stool is tilting dangerously.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's reaching into the cookie jar like it's a treasure.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl looks eager, arm extended for her share.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This could end badly if he tips over.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The open cabinets frame their sneaky operation.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water damage is already starting on the doors.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wish someone would notice before it's too late.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The contrast with the calm outside is striking.
segments.speaker: PAR
